sentences.en: Don't stare at me— it's impolite!
sentences.cn: 别盯着我看——这是不礼貌的！

sentences.en: He wasn't just impolite — he was downright rude.
sentences.cn: 他不仅仅是不礼貌,而是无礼透顶.

sentences.en: His impolite words angered his teacher.
sentences.cn: 他出言不逊,激怒了他的老师.

sentences.en: I was impolite and I do beg your pardon.
It is impolite not to do so.
It is impolite to ask too many questions.
sentences.cn: 提出过多的问题是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: It is impolite to get a word in.
sentences.cn: 别人谈话时插嘴是不礼貌的.

sentences.en: It is very impolite of you to do so to customers.
sentences.cn: 你这样做对顾客太不客气了.

sentences.en: It's impolite to call the black people Negro.
sentences.cn: 称呼黑人为Negro是不礼貌的。

sentences.en: It's impolite to gibe at a foreign student's English.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑外国学生的英语是不礼貌的.

sentences.en: It's impolite to make a tardy appearance.
Please forgive me for being impolite.
She ordered that impolite fellow out.
sentences.cn: 她责令那个无礼的家伙出去.

sentences.en: She was genuinely angered at his impolite words.
sentences.cn: 听到他粗鲁的话,她可真动火了.

sentences.en: Some people think it is impolite to ask someone's age.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为询问别人的年龄是不礼貌的。

trans.tran_cn: 不礼貌的，失礼的，粗鲁的，不客气，悖礼，非礼
